title: You don’t need a brand new computer, you just need Windows 11 Pro for $14.97
content:
Macworld

Let me be clear: You do not need to buy a new computer when your old one starts running slower. I know, I know, the dopamine hit from buying something new is tempting, but in this economy, we’re making the most out of our old gear. The best way to get improved functionality out of your old computer is by upgrading your operating system. For a limited time, you can score Windows 11 Pro for just $14.97.

Maximize your computer’s functionality by adding Windows 11 Pro into the mix to get the best of both worlds. Windows 11 Pro features a seamless interface that helps increase productivity while being visually pleasing. Plus, you get access to a world of advanced security like biometric login, Smart App Control, and advanced antivirus defenses.

Get the most out of gaming with DirectX 12 Ultimate graphics that allow you to play the game the way it was intended: with rich visuals and realistic graphics.

Whether you want to dip your toe into the Windows world before making a full commitment to a PC, or just want to get the most out of your Mac, upgrading to Windows 11 Pro is a great way to enhance your operating system for just $14.97. Regularly $199, you don’t want to miss this deal.
